text:
The GOLDEN NOIR look is all about the perfect balance between radiant gold eyes and a velvety nude lip.

Chic Mono Eyeshadow in Shimmer Gold 17 creates a creamy, buildable gold shimmer, while Fabulous Eyeliner defines with a smooth, mistake-free wing. Fabulous Eyes Mascara adds volume, curl, and lift, perfectly complementing the soft, blurring effect of Fabulous Kiss Blur Matte Lipstick in Nude Smile 140.

The result? A luminous, bold eye paired with a plush, neutral lip—creating a look that’s the epitome of #HerreraBeauty.

Shop the look online for selected countries at carolinaherrera.com.

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person

text:
GOLDEN NOIR by #HerreraBeauty

Transform your look with the perfect balance of gold shimmer, bold liner, and a velvety nude lip:

Step 1. Apply Chic Mono Eyeshadow in Shimmer Gold 17 all over your eyelids for a creamy, buildable gold shimmer that melts into the skin.
Step 2. Create a flawless wing with Fabulous Eyeliner, its waterproof, flexible formula allowing for easy, mistake-free lines.
Step 3. Add lashings of Fabulous Eye Smudgeproof Mascara for incredible volume, curl, and lift that lasts all day.
Step 4. Finish with Fabulous Kiss Blur Matte Lipstick in Nude Smile 140, leaving lips plump and velvety soft for up to 12 hours.

Radiant, powerful, and impossible to ignore.

Shop the look online for selected countries at carolinaherrera.com.

text:
GOLDEN NOIR by #HerreraBeaty.

The perfect mix of rich shimmer and bold definition. Shimmering gold eyes, striking winged liner, voluminous lashes, and a plump, velvety nude lip. 

Shop the look and discover the entire collection online for selected countries at carolinaherrera.com.

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person

text:
The QUARTZ GLOW look is all about the perfect balance between bold eyes and a strong lip. 

Chic Mono Eyeshadow in Metallic Quartz 07 creates a luminous, translucent base, while Fabulous Eyeliner adds striking definition. Fabulous Eyes Waterproof Mascara builds dramatic volume and length, complementing the intensity of Fabulous Kiss Matte Lipstick in our signature red, Carolina 310. 

The result? A soft, bitten red lip that perfectly contrasts the boldness of the eyes, creating a look that’s essentially #HerreraBeauty.

Shop the look online for selected countries at carolinaherrera.com.

media.ocrText: May be a closeup of one or more people, eyeliner, makeup and text

text:
QUARTZ GLOW by #HerreraBeauty

A look that captures light and depth: translucent shimmer, precise eyeliner, bold lashes, and a perfectly soft matte red lip.

Shop the look and discover the entire collection online for selected countries at carolinaherrera.com.

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person and jewelry

text:
QUARTZ GLOW by #HerreraBeauty

Elevate your look with the perfect mix of shimmer, precision, and a signature red lip:

Step 1. Sweep Chic Mono Eyeshadow in Metallic Quartz 07 over your lids for a translucent, wet-look glow that works beautifully on every skin tone.
Step 2. Create striking designs with Fabulous Eyeliner, its smooth-glide formula and precision tip making bold lines effortless.
Step 3. Add drama with Fabulous Eye Mascara in Waterproof, giving you extra-black, defined lashes with extra length for up to 24 hours.
Step 4. Complete the look with a freshly bitten effect using Fabulous Kiss Matte Lipstick in Carolina 310—a soft matte red that stays vibrant and never compromises on comfort.

Refined, radiant, and unmistakably Herrera.

Shop the look online for selected countries at carolinaherrera.com.

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 2025.
Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX.

Look 64 - Abuk

Strapless gown with tiered cascading tulle and embroidery, created in collaboration with Virginia Verónica Arce Arce (@vicky.arce.946179), paired with ceramic tile drop earrings designed in collaboration with Jacqueline España Capilla (@jacqueline.espana.joyeria).

Picture by @martinkeenan

-

Look 64 - Abuk

Vestido sin tirantes con tul en capas en cascada y bordados creados en colaboración con Virginia Verónica Arce Arce (@vicky.arce.946179), combinado con pendientes de Talavera, creados en colaboración con Jacqueline España Capilla (@jacqueline.espana.joyeria).

#HerreraInCDMX

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 2025 First Looks at the Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX.

Special thanks to the artisans Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan @mariadelosangeleslicona , Bibiana Hernández @bibilicona , Virginia Verónica Arce Arce @vicky.arce.946179 , Araceli Nibra Matadamas @aracelinibra and Jacqueline España Capilla @jacqueline.espana.joyeria that collaborated in this collection.

Watch the show again and shop our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection at carolinaherrera.com or in selected stores.

Film Direction @martinkeenan

-

Carolina Herrera Resort 2025 First Looks en el Museo Anahuacalli, en CDMX.

Agradecimientos especiales a las artesanas Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan @mariadelosangeleslicona , Bibiana Hernández @bibilicona , Virginia Verónica Arce Arce @vicky.arce.946179 , Araceli Nibra Matadamas @aracelinibra y Jacqueline España Capilla @jacqueline.espana.joyeria, que han colaborado en la colección.

Vuelve a ver el desfile y descubre nuestra primera colección see-now-buy-now

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 2025.
Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX.

Look 3 - @alidansky

Embroidered puff-sleeve, collarless jacket with detailed embroidery, paired with a miniskirt in marigold.

Picture by @martinkeenan

-

Chaqueta bordada de mangas abullonadas sin cuello y con bordado detallado, combinada con una minifalda en color caléndula.

#HerreraInCDMX

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person

text: Last night back in New York, Carolina Herrera and FRAME celebrated the launch of their denim capsule collection at Chez Margaux, hosted by Creative Directors @WesGordon and @eriktorstensson. Friends of both houses joined in the celebration, precisely one week after the collection debuted on the runway in Mexico City, including @siennathing,@ameliagray, @erinnwestbrook, @avantika. Shop the collection now on carolinaherrera.com frame-store.com and select partners.

media.ocrText: May be an image of 3 people, eyewear and text
May be an image of 1 person, fur coat, eyewear and text
May be an image of 1 person
May be an image of 4 people, suit and leather

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 2025.
Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX.

Look 50 - @lumavito_ 

Oversized cotton embroidered shirt in white, created in collaboration with Maestra María de los Ángeles
Licona San Juan (@mariadelosangeleslicona), and a Carolina Herrera x @frame high-waisted denim skirt in
red. Paired with hand-painted jícara earrings and a necklace designed in collaboration with Araceli Nibra
Matadamas (@aracelinibra).

Picture by @martinkeenan

-

Camisa de algodón oversized bordada, creada en colaboración con la Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan (@mariadelosangeleslicona), y una falda de mezclilla de talle alto Carolina Herrera x @frame en color rojo. Combinada con pendientes de jícara pintados a mano y un collar diseñado en colaboración con Araceli Nibra Matadamas (@aracelinibra).

#HerreraInCDMX

media.ocrText: May be an image of 2 people

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 2025.
Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX.

Look 5 - @valeryflos 

Embroidered strapless minidress in marigold, paired with a soft satin clutch with a bow handle in kiwi and dome beaded earrings in marigold.

Picture by @martinkeenan

-

Minivestido sin tirantes bordado en color caléndula, combinado con un clutch de satén suave con asa de lazo en kiwi y pendientes de cuentas en forma y color caléndula.

#HerreraInCDMX

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person

text:
Postcards in motion from our Resort 25 experience in CDMX: a welcome gathering at @contramarmx, an intimate celebratory dinner at Luis Barragán’s @casa_pedregal, and the runway show and afterparty held at Museo @anahuacalli.

#HerreraInCDMX

text:
Postcards in motion from our Resort 25 experience in CDMX: a welcome gathering at @contramarmx, an intimate celebratory dinner at Luis Barragán’s @casa_pedregal, and the runway show and afterparty held at Museo @anahuacalli.

#HerreraInCDMX

text:
The Carolina Herrera runway show in CDMX took place at the iconic Museo Anahuacalli (@anahuacalli) in Coyoacán, a project conceptualized by Diego Rivera in collaboration with his daughter Ruth Rivera and architect Juan O’Gorman. The museum houses Mexico’s largest private pre-Hispanic collection and is designed as a pyramid, set within a fourhectare native garden, with an extension building conceived by architect Mauricio Rocha in 2021.

Museo Anahuacalli Director Teresa Moya and Curator Karla Niño de Rivera (@karlaninno) shared insights into this extraordinary project.

Film by @aranmartinezsolana.

-

El desfile de Carolina Herrera en CDMX tuvo lugar en el icónico Museo Anahuacalli (@anahuacalli) en Coyoacán, un proyecto conceptualizado por Diego Rivera en colaboración con Juan O’Gorman y su hija Ruth Rivera. El museo alberga la colección privada prehispánica más grande de México y está diseñado como una pirámide, ubicada dentro de un jardín nativo de cuatro hectáreas, con un edificio anexo concebido por el arquitecto Mauricio Rocha en 2021.

La directora del Museo Anahuacalli, Teresa Moya, y la curadora del mismo, Karla Niño de Rivera (@karlaninno), comparten detalles sobre este extraordinario proyecto.

#HerreraInCDMX

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 2025 runway show backstage at the Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX.

Look 25 - @zairamayari

Full-sleeve black cotton embroidered button-down shirt created in collaboration with Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan (@mariadelosangeleslicona), styled with a Carolina Herrera x @frame floor-length denim skirt in white, and hand-painted jícara earrings and necklace designed in collaboration with Araceli Nibra Matadamas (@aracelinibra).

Picture by @enriqueleyva_

-

Look 25 - @zairamayari

Camisa de algodón negra de manga larga con bordado y botones, creada en colaboración con la Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan (@mariadelosangeleslicona), estilizada con una falda larga de mezclilla blanca Carolina Herrera x @frame, y pendientes y collar de jícara pintados a mano, diseñados en colaboración con Araceli Nibra Matadamas (@aracelinibra).

#HerreraInCDMX

text:
En el corazón de México late la artesanía. Con motivo del desfile Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera, que se presentó en el Museo Anahuacalli el 14 de noviembre, el director creativo @wesgordon colaboró con cuatro artesanas que conservan y proyectan al futuro la sabiduría de sus comunidades.
En San Isidro Buen Suceso (Tlaxcala), Virginia Verónica Arce Arce @vicky.arce.946179 ha refinado los bordados tradicionales con motivos que rinden homenaje a la cultura nahua. Las joyas que Araceli Nibra Matadamas @aracelinibra pinta y decora a mano a partir de jícaras son fruto de la cultura artesanal de Oaxaca. 

–

At the heart of Mexico lies its vibrant artisanal tradition. For the Resort 25 collection, presented at the Museo Anahuacalli on November 14, creative director Wes Gordon ( @wesgordon ) collaborated with four women artisans who honor and reimagine the wisdom of their communities.

text:
En el corazón de México late la artesanía. Con motivo del desfile Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera, que se presentó en el Museo Anahuacalli el 14 de noviembre, el director creativo @wesgordon colaboró con cuatro artesanas que conservan y proyectan al futuro la sabiduría de sus comunidades.
Los bordados de Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan @mariadelosangeleslicona (El Nanthe, Tenango de Doria, Hildalgo) son una oda a la belleza natural de la región y se plasman en diez prendas con contrastes de color. En Tlaxcala, Jacqueline España Capilla @jacqueline.espana.joyeria ha sabido reinterpretar la talavera tradicional, una cerámica esmaltada en blanco y azul cuyo origen se remonta a las culturas prehispánicas, para crear joyas y detalles ornamentales para varios modelos de la colección.

–

At the heart of Mexico lies its vibrant artisanal tradition. For the Resort 25 collection, presented at the Museo Anahuacalli on November 14, creative director Wes Gordon ( @wesgordon ) collaborated with four women artis

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person

text:
En San Isidro Buen Suceso (Tlaxcala), en las faldas de La Malinche, Virginia Verónica Arce Arce @vicky.arce.946179 crea bordados inspirados en la belleza natural de su entorno. Su padre le enseñó a bordar cuando tenía 15 años y desde entonces se esfuerza por mantener viva una artesanía que también forma parte de la identidad de su comunidad. Con la ayuda de una vieja máquina de coser, ha elevado su oficio gracias a su exigencia y sensibilidad. En la colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera, las franjas bordadas de Virginia Verónica Arce Arce protagonizan tres vestidos que reflejan también el amor por la belleza y la naturaleza de esta comunidad de Tlaxcala. 

–

In San Isidro Buen Suceso, Tlaxcala, at the foothills of La Malinche, Virginia Verónica Arce Arce ( @vicky.arce.946179 ) creates embroidery inspired by the natural beauty around her. Her father taught her to embroider at age 15, and she has since dedicated herself to preserving a craft that is integral to her community’s identity. With the help of an o

text:
En San Pablo del Monte, Tlaxcala, se trabaja la talavera, una delicada cerámica esmaltada en blanco lechoso y azul. A Jacqueline España Capilla @jacqueline.espana.joyeria le fascinaba desde la infancia. Cuando acabó sus estudios de ingeniería química, decidió experimentar con ella y explorar sus límites. “Aquí, la talavera es una especie de reliquia que tienes guardada, que se utiliza como adorno o se saca en las ocasiones especiales, y yo quería llevarla conmigo todo el tiempo, usarla día a día”, explica esta artesana implicada con el desarrollo de su comunidad. En su colaboración para la colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera, sus joyas adornan vestidos y complementos. “Como artesana productora de talavera tengo el compromiso de cuidar el patrimonio que me fue legado, y velar por su salvaguarda, cuidando su esencia e impulsando la innovación”.

–

Talavera, a delicate white and blue glazed ceramic, has long been cherished in San Pablo del Monte, Tlaxcala. Jacqueline España Capilla ( @jacqueline.espana.joye

text:
Araceli Nibra Matadamas @aracelinibra vive y trabaja en Oaxaca, uno de los epicentros de la artesanía en México. Por eso colabora con toda una red de artesanos de confianza para reivindicar ciertos oficios desde una óptica contemporánea. Trabaja con latoneros, bordadoras o pintores, y ella misma decora jícaras con pintura, bordado, macramé y otros materiales. En el desfile de la colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera, Araceli Nibra colabora con una serie de piezas de joyería que reinterpretan sus célebres jícaras y emplean distintos materiales naturales.

–

Araceli Nibra Matadamas ( @aracelinibra ) lives and works in Oaxaca, one of Mexico’s craft epicenters. She collaborates with a trusted network of artisans to celebrate traditional crafts through a contemporary lens. Working with metalsmiths, embroiderers, painters, and more, she also hand-decorates jícaras using paint, embroidery, macramé, and other materials. text:
Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan @mariadelosangeleslicona aprendió a bordar de niña. En aquella época no había escuelas para las comunidades indígenas de El Nanthe, en Tenango de Doria (Hidalgo). “Pero con el apoyo de la costura he sacado adelante a mis ocho hijos”, explica. “La manta es mi cuaderno y la aguja es mi lapicero”. Para la colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera, María de los Ángeles Licona ha creado los bordados de diez prendas. 

–

María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan ( @mariadelosangeleslicona ) learned embroidery as a child. At the time, there were no schools for the Indigenous communities of El Nanthe in Tenango de Doria, Hidalgo. “But thanks to sewing, I’ve been able to support my eight children,” she explains. “The fabric is my notebook, and the needle is my pen.” For Carolina Herrera’s Resort 25 collection, María de los Ángeles Licona created the embroidery for ten garments.

#HerreraInCDMX

Camila Queiroz, Sofía Reyes, Nava Mau, Macarena Achaga and Chiara Parravicini attended the Carolina Herrera Resort 25 Runway Show in CDMX, hosted at the iconic Anahuacalli Museum.

Watch the show again and shop our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection at carolinaherrera.com or in selected stores.

Featuring @camilaqueiroz, @sofiareyes, @navamau, @macabeso and @chiara_parravicini. 

Film by @aranmartinezsolana. 

-

Camila Queiroz, Sofía Reyes, Nava Mau, Macarena Achaga y Chiara Parravicini asistieron al desfile de la colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera en CDMX, celebrado en el icónico Museo Anahuacalli.

Vuelve a ver el desfile y adquiere nuestra primera colección "see-now-buy-now" en carolinaherrera.com o en tiendas seleccionadas.

text:
Caroline Trentini, Meghann Fahy, Melissa Barrera, Yalitza Aparicio, Gabrielle Caunesil and Luis Gerardo Méndez attended the Carolina Herrera Resort 25 Runway Show in CDMX, hosted at the iconic Anahuacalli Museum.

Watch the show again and shop our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection at carolinaherrera.com or in selected stores.

Featuring @carolinetrentini, @meghannfahy, @melissabarreram, @yalitzaapariciomtz, @gabriellecaunesil and @luisgerardom.

Film by @aranmartinezsolana.

-

Caroline Trentini, Meghann Fahy, Melissa Barrera, Yalitza Aparicio, Gabrielle Caunesil y Luis Gerardo Méndez asistieron al desfile de la colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera en CDMX, realizado en el icónico Museo Anahuacalli.

Vuelve a ver el desfile y compra nuestra primera colección see-now-buy-now en carolinaherrera.com o en tiendas seleccionadas.

Con @carolinetrentini, @meghannfahy, @melissabarreram, @yalitzaapariciomtz, @gabriellecaunesil y @luisgerardom.

#HerreraInCDMX

text:
Barbara López, Carolina A. Herrera, Julia Sarr-Jamois, Antonia Gentry, and Rebeca Andrade attended the Carolina Herrera Resort 25 Runway Show in CDMX, hosted at the iconic Anahuacalli Museum.

Watch the show again and shop our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection at carolinaherrera.com or in selected stores.

Featuring @barbara_lopez21, Carolina A. Herrera, @sarrjamois, @_antoniagentry_ and @rebecarandrade.

-

Barbara López, Carolina A. Herrera, Julia Sarr-Jamois, Antonia Gentry y Rebeca Andrade asistieron al desfile Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera en CDMX, celebrado en el icónico Museo Anahuacalli.

Vuelve a ver el desfile y compra nuestra primera colección "see-now-buy-now" en carolinaherrera.com o en tiendas seleccionadas.

Con @barbara_lopez21, Carolina A. Herrera, @sarrjamois, @antoniagentry y @rebecarandrade.

#HerreraInCDMX

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 25 collection by Creative Director @wesgordon was presented in Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX. The culmination of a decades-long journey of exploration, discovery and connection between the House of Herrera and Mexico.

Special thanks to the artisans Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan @mariadelosangeleslicona , Bibiana Hernández @bibilicona , Virginia Verónica Arce Arce @vicky.arce.946179 , Araceli Nibra Matadamas @aracelinibra and Jacqueline España Capilla @jacqueline.espana.joyeria that collaborated in this collection.

Watch the show again and shop our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection at carolinaherrera.com or in selected stores.

Show Design @bureaubetak
Film Direction @bureaufuture
Styling @mariechaix
Casting @rachel_chandler
Makeup @anagdev
Hair @evaniefrausto
Nails @zai.vega
Sound design @tomo20

Pictures by @khristio & @zoejbrt

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 25 collection by Creative Director @wesgordon was presented in Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX. The culmination of a decades-long journey of exploration, discovery and connection between the House of Herrera and Mexico.

Special thanks to the artisans Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan @mariadelosangeleslicona , Bibiana Hernández @bibilicona , Virginia Verónica Arce Arce @vicky.arce.946179 , Araceli Nibra Matadamas @aracelinibra and Jacqueline España Capilla @jacqueline.espana.joyeria that collaborated in this collection.

Watch the show again and shop our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection at carolinaherrera.com or in selected stores.

Show Design @bureaubetak
Film Direction @bureaufuture
Styling @mariechaix
Casting @rachel_chandler
Makeup @anagdev
Hair @evaniefrausto
Nails @zai.vega
Sound design @tomo20

Pictures by @khristio 

-

La colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera, diseñada por el director creativo @wesgordon, se ha presentado en el Museo Anahuacalli (Ciudad de México)

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 25 collection by Creative Director @wesgordon was presented in Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX. The culmination of a decades-long journey of exploration, discovery and connection between the House of Herrera and Mexico.

Special thanks to the artisans Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan, Bibiana Hernández, Virginia Verónica Arce Arce, Araceli Nibra Matadamas and Jacqueline España Capilla that collaborated in this collection.

Watch the show again and shop our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection at carolinaherrera.com or in selected stores.

Show Design @bureaubetak
Film Direction @bureaufuture
Styling @mariechaix
Casting @rachel_chandler
Makeup @anagdev
Hair @evaniefrausto
Nails @zai.vega
Sound design @tomo20

-

La colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera, diseñada por el director creativo @wesgordon, se ha presentado en el Museo Anahuacalli (Ciudad de México). Es la culminación de décadas de investigación, descubrimiento y conexiones entre la Casa Herrera y México.

Agradecimiento

text:
Look 42 - @juliaa_ardon 

Carolina Herrera Resort 25 collection by Creative Director @wesgordon was presented in Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX. The culmination of a decades-long journey of exploration, discovery and connection between the House of Herrera and Mexico.

Special thanks to the artisans Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan @mariadelosangeleslicona , Bibiana Hernández @bibilicona , Virginia Verónica Arce Arce @vicky.arce.946179 , Araceli Nibra Matadamas @aracelinibra and Jacqueline España Capilla @jacqueline.espana.joyeria that collaborated in this collection.

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 25 collection by Creative Director @wesgordon was presented in Anahuacalli Museum, CDMX. The culmination of a decades-long journey of exploration, discovery and connection between the House of Herrera and Mexico.

#HerreraInCDMX

text:
Carolina Herrera Resort 25 in CDMX show venue. Red and pink against Anahuacalli Museum in Coyoacán. 

Join us today at 6PM (CST) to discover the Carolina Herrera Resort 25 Runway Show by Creative Director @wesgordon , streaming live from Mexico City.

#HerreraInCDMX

text:
Come behind the scenes of our Resort 25 collection, as the brand’s decades-long bond with Mexico comes to life in a collection celebrating craftsmanship, culture, and inspiration. Drawing from the luminous sunsets of Mexico City, Wes Gordon collaborated with four artisans to create one-of-a-kind pieces that honor the best of Mexican artistry. Featuring works by Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan, Virginia Verónica Arce Arce, Jacqueline España Capilla and Araceli Nibra Matadamas; this collection pays tribute to the cultures that continue to shape the brand.

Our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection will be available at carolinaherrera.com and select stores.

text:
Come behind the scenes of our Resort 25 collection, as the brand’s decades-long bond with Mexico comes to life in a collection celebrating craftsmanship, culture, and inspiration. Drawing from the luminous sunsets of Mexico City, Wes Gordon collaborated with four artisans to create one-of-a-kind pieces that honor the best of Mexican artistry. Featuring works by Maestra María de los Ángeles Licona San Juan, Virginia Verónica Arce Arce, Jacqueline España Capilla and Araceli Nibra Matadamas; this collection pays tribute to the cultures that continue to shape the brand.

Our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection will be available at carolinaherrera.com and select stores.

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person and dancing

text:
Carolina Herrera x FRAME: Where runway meets denim expertise. The result? Ultra colorful, unforgettable designs.

Shop CarolinaHerreraxFRAME now.

text:
Carolina Herrera x FRAME: A limited-edition capsule of vibrant denim is boldly saturated and tailored to the signature silhouettes of both fashion houses.

Shop Carolina Herrera x FRAME now.

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person, eyewear and text

text:
Introducing Carolina Herrera x FRAME
 
Creative Director @WesGordon and FRAME’s @eriktorstensson have come together to create a vibrant denim capsule collection, debuting today on the Carolina Herrera 2025 Resort Runway in Mexico City. The color palette of the collection reflects the vibrant energy of the city, featuring boldly saturated and color-blocked denim, tailored to the signature silhouettes of Carolina Herrera and FRAME.
 
Shop CarolinaHerreraxFRAME now.

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person, eyewear and text

text:
On his inspiration trip to CDMX, Creative Director @wesgordon connected with the city’s creatives, exploring culture, architecture, art, and gastronomy. All insiders agree: Mexico City is the hottest city in the world right now.

Join us on Thursday November 14th at 6PM (CST) to discover the Carolina Herrera Resort 2025 Runway Show by Creative Director @wesgordon , streaming live from Mexico City.

Our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection will be available at carolinaherrera.com and select stores.

–

En su viaje de inspiración a la CDMX, el Director Creativo @wesgordon conversó con creativos de la ciudad sobre cultura, arquitectura, arte y gastronomía. Todos coinciden: Ciudad de México es, ahora mismo, la ciudad más vibrante del mundo.

Te esperamos el 14 de noviembre a las 6PM (CST) para descubrir la colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera diseñada por el director creativo @wesgordon , en directo desde Ciudad de México.

Nuestra primera colección see-now-buy-now estará disponible para compra y pre-order en

text:
Join us on Thursday November 14th at 6PM (CST) to discover the Carolina Herrera Resort 25 Runway Show by Creative Director @wesgordon , streaming live from Mexico City.

Our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection will be available at carolinaherrera.com and select stores.

—

Te esperamos el 14 de noviembre a las 6PM (CST) para descubrir la colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera diseñada por el director creativo @wesgordon , en directo desde Ciudad de México.

Nuestra primera colección see-now-buy-now estará disponible para compra y pre-order en carolinaherrera.com y tiendas seleccionadas.

#HerreraInCDMX

media.ocrText: May be an image of 3 people and text

text:
Talking about how good the food in Mexico is a bit of a cliché, but what can we do if it truly is something extraordinary. Wes Gordon spoke with CDMX experts to explore the city’s gastronomy. ¡Buen provecho!

Join us on Thursday November 14th at 6PM (CST) to discover the Carolina Herrera Resort 2025 Runway Show by Creative Director @wesgordon , streaming live from Mexico City.

Our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection will be available to shop and pre-order from carolinaherrera.com and select stores.

–

Hablar de lo buena que está la comida en México es un poco cliché, pero qué le vamos a hacer si realmente es extraordinaria. Wes Gordon conversó con expertos de CDMX para explorar la gastronomía de la ciudad. ¡Buen provecho!

Te esperamos el 14 de noviembre a las 6PM (CST) para descubrir la colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera diseñada por el director creativo @wesgordon , en directo desde Ciudad de México.

Nuestra primera colección see-now-buy-now estará disponible para compra y pre-order en carolinaher

text:
Carolina Herrera’s personal love story with Mexico has only been growing stronger over the past decades, as the archives footages show. 

Join us on Thursday November 14th at 6PM (CST) to discover the Carolina Herrera Resort 25 Runway Show by Creative Director @wesgordon , streaming live from Mexico City.

Our first-ever see-now-buy-now collection will be available at carolinaherrera.com and select stores.

–

Como muestran las imágenes de archivo, la historia de amor de Carolina Herrera con México viene de lejos.

Te esperamos el 14 de noviembre a las 6PM (CST) para descubrir la colección Resort 25 de Carolina Herrera diseñada por el director creativo @wesgordon , en directo desde Ciudad de México.

Nuestra primera colección see-now-buy-now estará disponible para compra y pre-order en carolinaherrera.com y tiendas seleccionadas.

#HerreraInCDMX

text:
For a festive pout that’s both chic and timeless, follow @‌laracosima_’s lead with #HerreraBeauty’s Fabulous Kiss Blur Matte Lipstick in Vamp Style 773. This hyaluronic-infused formula glides effortlessly onto lips, delivering buildable color, a soft velvety finish, and up to 12 hours of hydration. Complete your look with the Limited Edition Fabulous Kiss Snowflake cap and Snowflake charm—a perfect seasonal touch!

Discover these exclusive accessories and shop online for selected countries at carolinaherrera.com.

text:
The holidays call for soft, shimmering glam on the eyes. Recreate @‌laracosima_’s look with #HerreraBeauty’s Chic Mono Eyeshadows in Metallic Quartz 7 and Shimmer Mocha 20, paired with a few coats of Fabulous Eyes Waterproof Mascara for added drama.

Discover and shop this eye look online for selected countries at carolinaherrera.com.

text:
New Carolina Herrera Fall 24 Eyewear collection. A balance between classic and contemporary elegance designed by Creative Director @wesgordon. From fresh interpretations of color-blocking to meticulously crafted acetate details.

Shop now in carolinaherrera.com

text: The Fall Winter 2024 Collection reflects creative director @wesgordon’s dedication to artistry. Ruffles are undulating and architectural in their form. Embellishments are intricately woven, beaded and embroidered. Shop the fabulous collection now on carolinaherrera.com

text:

text:
Transform your look for Halloween with #HerreraBeauty's Fabulous Eyes Mascaras — buildable formulas that deliver exaggerated lift and curling action that lasts up to 24 hours in one easy swipe. 

Apply one coat for a subtle charm, two for a deeper spell and three for killer lashes… 🎃

Shop online for selected countries at carolinaherrera.com.

text:
"It is important that we continue to break down the boundaries for women across all fields to provide them with the same access to opportunities and visibility as their male counterparts," said Good Girl ambassador Karlie Kloss as she joined @puig_official in Barcelona to present the award at the inaugural Puig Women’s America’s Cup to the Italy’s Luna Rossa Prada Pirelli (@lunarossachallenge) team.

#PuigWomensAmericasCup

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person
May be an image of 1 person and eyewear
May be an image of 1 person, eyewear and boat

text:
Karlie in Barcelona!

Good Girl ambassador joined Carolina Herrera's parent company, @puig_official to present the award of the first-ever all-female @americascup competition, Puig Women’s America’s Cup. This victory marks the first-ever trophy in this all-female sailing competition, setting a groundbreaking milestone for women in sports.

#PuigWomensAmericasCup

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person and boat

text:
Create the perfect look for fall using just four #HerreraBeauty staples: Chic Mono Eyeshadows in Metallic Copper 15 and Shimmer Mocha 20, Fabulous Eyeliner and lashings of Fabulous Eyes Smudgeproof Mascara. 

Head to carolinaherrera.com to discover the full tutorial and shop the collection online for selected countries.

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person and jewelry

text:
Precision is everything. Starting from the outer corner of the eyes, create a bold graphic wing using #HerreraBeauty 's new Fabulous Eyeliner and line the lower lash line from the inside corner, out. 

Designed for a flexible hold, this innovative formula acts like a second skin for 48h of waterproof, smudgeproof, lifeproof wear. 

Discover it online for selected countries at carolinaherrera.com.

media.ocrText: May be an image of 1 person

text:
Pair Carolina Herrera’s Black One Sleeve Ruffle Shoulder Dress with #HerreraBeauty's bronzed makeup look for this fall. 

Blend Chic Mono Eyeshadow in Metallic Copper 15 and Shimmer Mocha 20, define with Fabulous Eyeliner, and finish with Fabulous Eyes Mascara. Complete with Fabulous Kiss Sheer Lipstick in Nude Smile 140 on the lips, and you are ready to go.

Shop the look now at carolinaherrera.com.
